products.title: Oslo Blackout Dove Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Dove Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £7.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Oslo Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This soft Dove Grey roller blind adds bold and vibrant  enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our roller are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This grey neutral roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.metadescription: ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric.
A cream roller blind easily brightens up the space. Our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This cream blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms.  Roller blinds bring a contemporary and modern look to the space, and as all our blinds are child-safe, our roller blinds can be installed anywhere in the house!
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This cream roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Konya Blackout Butter Cream
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Butter Cream Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Butter Cream Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Metz PVC Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Metz PVC Blackout Cream Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £10.36 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Metz PVC Blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, Metz fabrics are durable and practical. This neutral cream, marbled, Cream blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roller blind is made by our expert team, in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with a FREE five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £20.95 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Versailles Blackout Ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish.  In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window.  Crafted with blackout material, it won’t allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate.  The blind is also treated with Pollergen™, this neutralises pollen so it doesn’t disturb hayfever sufferers.
